document.full_text: amanda hocking, the 26-year-old author who shot to fame by selling more than a million copies of her self-published books, has signed a deal with st. martin's press.
document.title: amanda hocking signs book deal
lines_and_colors: amanda hocking, the 26-year-old author who shot to fame by selling more than a million copies of her self-published books, has signed a deal with st. martin's press.
